app.title: buurt-check
app.subtitle: Pre-viewing intelligence for property buyers
search.placeholder: Paste or type a Dutch address...
building.title: Building Facts
building.noBuilding: No building data found for this address.
map.title: Building Footprint
error.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
viewer3d.title: 3D Neighborhood
sunlight.title: Sunlight Analysis
sunlight.unavailable: No 3D building context available — sunlight analysis requires surrounding buildings.
sunlight.meaning.low: This building receives good direct sunlight year-round. Even in winter, the rooftop gets several hours of sun.
sunlight.meaning.medium: This building gets moderate direct sunlight. In winter, surrounding buildings may block sun for part of the day. Check window orientation during your viewing.
sunlight.meaning.high: This building gets very little direct sunlight in winter. Surrounding buildings significantly block the sun. Visit the property on a winter afternoon to assess natural light.
sunlight.meaning.unavailable: No 3D building context available — sunlight analysis requires surrounding buildings.
sunlight.viewingTip: Ask the seller: Which rooms get direct sunlight? Are there plans for new construction nearby that could block light?
sunlight.source: Source: 3DBAG + SunCalc (indicative, based on roof-level analysis)
risk.fetchError: Risk data could not be loaded right now. Please try again later.
risk.disclaimer: Indicative open-data signal. Verify on-site and with official reports before purchase.
risk.noise.title: Road Traffic Noise (Lden)
risk.noise.meaning.low: Road-traffic noise appears limited. Daily disturbance risk is relatively low.
risk.noise.meaning.medium: Road-traffic noise may be noticeable in daily use, especially with open windows.
risk.noise.meaning.high: Road-traffic noise is likely substantial and may affect sleep, comfort, and livability.
risk.noise.meaning.unavailable: Noise data could not be sampled for this location right now.
risk.noise.question: Ask/check at viewing: Can you close windows and still hear traffic? What are rush-hour noise levels in bedroom-facing rooms?
risk.air.title: Air Quality (PM2.5 / NO2)
risk.air.meaning.low: Air-quality indicators are relatively favorable for this location.
risk.air.meaning.medium: Air-quality indicators suggest moderate exposure. Sensitive residents may notice effects.
risk.air.meaning.high: Air-quality indicators are elevated. Long-term exposure risk is meaningfully higher.
risk.air.meaning.unavailable: Air-quality data could not be sampled for this location right now.
risk.air.question: Ask/check at viewing: Are windows often kept closed due to traffic fumes? Is there mechanical ventilation with good filtration?
risk.climate.title: Climate Stress (Heat / Water)
risk.climate.meaning.low: Climate-stress signals look limited for this location under sampled layers.
risk.climate.meaning.medium: Climate-stress signals suggest a moderate chance of heat or water nuisance.
risk.climate.meaning.high: Climate-stress signals indicate meaningful heat and/or water nuisance risk.
risk.climate.meaning.unavailable: Climate-stress data is not available for this address in the selected atlas layers.
risk.climate.question: Ask/check at viewing: Have there been heat or water issues in recent years? Which mitigation measures were installed by owner/VvE?
risk.warning.NOISE_LAYER_UNAVAILABLE: Noise data layer is currently unavailable.
risk.warning.NOISE_NO_VALUE: No noise measurement at this exact location.
risk.warning.NOISE_LOOKUP_FAILED: Noise data could not be retrieved right now.
risk.warning.AIR_NO_VALUE: No air quality measurements at this location.
risk.warning.AIR_PARTIAL: Only partial air quality data is available.
risk.warning.AIR_LOOKUP_FAILED: Air quality data could not be retrieved right now.
risk.warning.CLIMATE_NO_DATA: No climate stress data available for this location.
risk.warning.CLIMATE_PARTIAL: Only partial climate stress data is available.
risk.warning.CLIMATE_LOOKUP_FAILED: Climate stress data could not be retrieved right now.
